entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 01:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Wind Chill: -10
Wind: SSE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon then to 70 gusting to 100 except gusting to 150 in the Wreckhouse area late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 90 km/h gusting to 110 except gusting to 160 in the Wreckhouse area in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
